holidays.title: National Tortilla Chip Day
holidays.description: Whether you eat yours plain or dip them, tortilla chips bring the fiesta to any occasion.

holidays.title: DiscoverE Girl Day
holidays.description: Encourage young girls to pursue their engineering dreams this DiscoverE Girl Day!

holidays.title: Dragobete
holidays.description: Birds do it, bees do it, and so do the Romanian youth on this particular day!

holidays.title: Edward Dickinson Baker Day
holidays.description: His history, fun facts, and why he’s so important — we're sharing it all with you!

holidays.title: Estonia Independence Day
holidays.description: We’re taking a virtual trip to Estonia and celebrating in grand style.

holidays.title: Flag Day Mexico
holidays.description: Time to sport some red, white, and green in solidarity with your Mexican ‘compadres’ today.

holidays.title: Friday Fish Fry Day
holidays.description: Grab your fork and take a bite of your fried fish this Friday Fish Fry Day.

holidays.title: I Hate Coriander Day
holidays.description: If rich dishes filled with coriander give you re-curry-ing nightmares, this is the day for you!

holidays.title: International Stand Up to Bullying Day
holidays.description: International Stand Up to Bullying Day is a part of Anti-Bullying Week.

holidays.title: National Skip the Straw Day
holidays.description: We can slurp more down by just going straight for the glass’s edge anyway!

holidays.title: National Tartar Sauce Day
holidays.description: As long as you have your tartar sauce next to it, you can never go wrong with seafood.

holidays.title: National Trading Card Day
holidays.description: If you are a 90s kid, you will remember how important trading cards were to you.

holidays.title: Sweden Finns Day
holidays.description: Call your friends! We’re celebrating Sweden Finns Day, and it’s all about community.

holidays.title: Twin Peaks Day
holidays.description: Twin Peaks is ranked among the greatest T.V. shows ever made — find out why here.

holidays.title: World Bartender Day
holidays.description: Bartenders mix our favorite drinks, keep customers happy, and often come up with delicious new drinks.

holidays.title: Yukon Heritage Day
holidays.description: Binging the history and culture of the smallest of Canada’s three territories to the forefront.

holidays.title: Earl Sweatshirt’s Birthday
holidays.description: He has won the hearts of millions with his spectacular performances and rapping.

holidays.title: Floyd Mayweather Jr.’s Birthday
holidays.description: Known as one of the greatest boxers, Floyd Mayweather is a 12- time world champion.

holidays.title: Steve Jobs’s Birthday
holidays.description: This ambitious visionary can rest knowing he showed humanity the way to its tech future.
